alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 10:19PM PST until March 04 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT BELOW 1000 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, hail and sleet expected. For the Winter Storm Watch below 1000 feet, heavy wet snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches possible. * WHERE...Northern Humboldt County coast. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 4 AM to 10 PM PST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Saturday evening through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
